contentfulProject.name: GreenCast
contentfulProject.summary: App for subscribing to and playing podcasts

childMarkdownRemark.html:
• React app with NodeJS backend
  • Queried podcast data via iTunes API for fast access to vast library of content
  • Implemented social authentication strategies with Passport.js and OAuth
  • MongoDB based schema for performant lookups and to facilitate rapid development based on project scale.
